meanings.definition: Make a buzzing or humming noise.
meanings.sent1: The bees were bombinating around the flowers.
meanings.sent2: The old refrigerator was bombinating loudly in the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The bombinating sound of the fan put me to sleep.
meanings.sent4: The city was bombinating with activity on a busy Saturday night.
meanings.sent5: The bombinating of the cicadas filled the summer air with music.

meanings.sent1: The wires bombinated softly in the background.
meanings.sent2: The machine bombinated as it worked tirelessly.
meanings.sent3: The bombinating of the computer was oddly soothing.
meanings.sent4: The forest bombinated with life as the sun rose.
meanings.sent5: The bombinating of the bees signaled the arrival of spring.
